div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 716 Thrace ?, 1933-1934 (1107) Burial: c. 357 B.C. (Robinson) Contents: 41 AR. Abdera: 4 st. Byzantium: 1 tetradr. Thasos: 1 tetradr.; 27 didr.; 7 dr.; 1 triob. Disposition: London 13; New York 7; R. C. Lockett 2 Robinson, NC 1934, pp. 244-54, illus. Le Rider, Deux tr√©sors, pp. 47-8
